title: Buffing Zed while keeping him very healthy.

embed.description: Looks like Riot hates a certain playerbase.

body:
So as we all know Zed is currently the 7th weakest champion in the game while also being the 3rd hardest. The way he is in his current state is fucking unacceptable so these changes are aiming to fix that while keeping his identity without breaking him.

1.) Zed's Shadows can now Auto Attack AND can also use his passive

2.) Passive now doubles Zed's current lethality.

3.) Shadow Slash now taunts for 2 seconds. And when the duration ends you're hit with 400 True Damage + 60% AD.

4.) Death Mark is now global.

I feel this will really define Zed who he is as a champion and these very SLIGHT buffs will help him escape his current state that he is in now but this isn't even close to what he actually needs.

Shoutout to Samizul, RiotZiegler, and CertainlyT for making the best and most mechanically challenging champion in the game.

Zed is way too weak right now. He definitely needs help.

I'm sorry, but Zed is currently weak? 
Sure, he can't burst down multiple targets like some of his sneaky-sneak friends. {{champion:91}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} 
But is there any champion who has an easier time assassinating a single target? I've seen a full build Zed 100-0 tanks with that ult.
I'll admit, I have very limited experience on the champion, but either every Zed I've seen has secretly been faker, or Zed seems to have a really easy time getting ahead, and being an absolute nightmare to deal with once there.

Ultimately, the fact that Zed can R back to his shadow after his ult for that very, very strong escape is why in my mind his stats and overall effectiveness deserve to be on the low end of high. Every other assassin would kill for something that reliable and that cheesey.

Let's be real, Zed arguably could do WITHOUT being able to return to his R shadow, because his W shadow can already offer him an escape.

Oh hey, and you know... Flash... the summoner spell that millions and millions of players have popped to try and escape a Zed over the years, only to have Zed give 0 ducks and kill them anyway.
Oh.... this post is satire, isn't it?
